title: An old rubber and tea estate for sale(IDNH22)
details:
11 acres rubber and 4 acres bare land
One who finding for cultivate, this is a good investment .
24 km to Galle southern highway entrance at pinnaduwa.
Direct access to the estate.
Water and electricity available.

NB:
The deeds are clear. Sinnakkara oppuwa.
🍀 A real estate agency handle this deal. No need brokers please!
